 2015-12652015-11-26,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActOfficial Residences Act
SubjectMarian Puego ** Appointment **
PrecisOrder (1) appointing MARIAN PUEGO as Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's residence; and (2) fixing her remuneration and conditions of employment.
AttachmentsAttachment
